p: The receptor for SARS-CoV-2, angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2), is a membrane-bound aminopeptidase whose function is to cleave angiotensin I and angiotensin II into two peptides, angiotensin-(1–9), and angiotensin-(1–7) ( 8). Angiotensin-(1–9) has cardiovascular-protective effects and angiotensin-(1–7) acts as vasodilator and has anti-proliferative, and anti-fibrotic function ( 8, 125, 126).
